title: Will Cigars Be Outlawed on Social Media and the Internet? - The After Show
itunes:title: Will Cigars Be Outlawed on Social Media and the Internet? - The After Show
description:
It seems to be starting in Singapore. They are going after bloggers for promoting cigars. Will this move to the U.S.?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
